description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Power Field, Tearing, Unwieldy

Note: Space Marines Only. Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Chainfist of the Minotaurs Chapter. Increases its Damage and Penetration by 5 against Vehicles, Structures, Objects, and enemies with the Machine Trait. As with all Chainfists, increases Unnatural Strength x2 to x3.

system.notes: Space Marines Only. Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Chainfist of the Minotaurs Chapter. Increases its Damage and Penetration by 5 against Vehicles, Structures, Objects, and enemies with the Machine Trait. As with all Chainfists, increases Unnatural Strength x2 to x3.
